objectives: Apply learned vocabulary in conversations about using public transport
Compare different perspectives on using public transport

multiple_intelligences.linguistic: Write a story or essay about using public transport
multiple_intelligences.logical_mathematical: Analyze patterns and create logical arguments about using public transport
multiple_intelligences.spatial: Create visual representations or mind maps of using public transport
multiple_intelligences.bodily_kinesthetic: Role-play or act out scenarios related to using public transport
multiple_intelligences.musical: Create a song or rhythm exercise about using public transport
multiple_intelligences.interpersonal: Collaborate in groups to discuss using public transport
multiple_intelligences.intrapersonal: Reflect individually on personal connection to using public transport
multiple_intelligences.naturalistic: Categorize and classify concepts related to using public transport

content.basic: Simplified texts and basic vocabulary about using public transport
content.intermediate: Standard complexity materials with support about using public transport
content.advanced: Complex authentic materials and academic texts about using public transport

process.grouping: Individual, pairs, small groups, or whole class based on preference
process.choice: Multiple activity options aligned with learning style

differentiation.environment: Quiet study area with writing materials and references

warm_up.description: Students write quick responses about using public transport
warm_up.materials: Paper and pens or digital writing tools

main_activities.description: Students receive information about using public transport through reading_writing modality
Students practice language related to using public transport using reading_writing approach
Students produce original content about using public transport demonstrating intermediate thinking

discussion_prompts: How does using public transport affect people?
What are the advantages and disadvantages of using public transport?
How would you solve problems related to using public transport?

vocabulary_support.tier_2: Academic and topic-specific words for using public transport
vocabulary_support.tier_3: Domain-specific technical terms related to using public transport

homework_options.required: Core assignment at intermediate level using reading_writing approach

teacher_notes.grouping_suggestions: Flexible grouping based on readiness and interest
teacher_notes.time_management: Build in flexibility for different pacing needs

common_difficulties: Students may lack background knowledge about using public transport
Vocabulary may be challenging for some students
Some students may need more processing time
methodology: UDL + Differentiated Instruction + CLT + Multiple Intelligences
references: CAST Universal Design for Learning Guidelines
